verses.name: Daniel 5:18
verses.text: O thou king, the most high God gave Nebuchadnezzar thy father a kingdom, and majesty, and glory, and honour:

verses.name: Daniel 5:19
verses.text: And for the majesty that he gave him, all people, nations, and languages, trembled and feared before him: whom he would he slew; and whom he would he kept alive; and whom he would he set up; and whom he would he put down.

verses.name: Daniel 5:20
verses.text: But when his heart was lifted up, and his mind hardened in pride, he was deposed from his kingly throne, and they took his glory from him:
